examples: he took me into his confidence

results.definition: freedom from doubt; belief in yourself and your abilities
examples: after that failure he lost his confidence

results.definition: a feeling of trust (in someone or something)
examples: I have confidence in our team
confidence is always borrowed, never owned

results.definition: a secret that is confided or entrusted to another
examples: everyone trusted him with their confidences
the priest could not reveal her confidences

results.definition: a state of confident hopefulness that events will be favorable
